timeline.bodyText: now i'm wondering, what about e.g. in-progress terms. i think you need to filter only for completed and closed ones
timeline.author: metas-ts
metas-ts

replies.bodyText:
There might be 500k bpartners; please return an iterator
(not sure if i approved the set in a previous PR, but i think it's wrong and we have IQuery.iterateIds(...))
replies.author: metas-ts

timeline.message:

* use iterator when retrieving partners;
* only retrieve completed or closed contracts
